answers.answer: dont know if it is thrush for sure but here is something i just read:Breast infections -- nonlactational mastitis -- are possible during pregnancy. They often present with breast pain (usually one-sided), as well as fever and/or other flu-like symptoms.A persistent case of thrush, which can present with shooting, deep breast pain, could also be present. Often women with thrush (candidiasis) have one or more of the following:a history of vaginal yeast infectionsuse of antibiotics, steroids or birth control pillshistory of diabetes (including gestational diabetes), anemia, or immune system disordersdiet high in sugars and dairy productsYou need to be properly evaluated by your health care provider to determine the cause of your pain, and its appropriate treatment.
It could just be colstrum, although mine was never white. If its colstrum its completly normal. Good luck and im glad you are happy with your decision!!!

question: Hi everyone,I wanted to thank this forum for helping me make the right choice. Keeping my baby is the best choice and I am so glad I did. I am officially in week nine. Anyway I know this is gross but last night I came home from a work function and my boobs where really sore, anyway there was like this white stuff coming out a really little bit but it was still there and it was creamy, does that make any sense since I am only 9 weeks?
title: White substance from the brast at nine weeks
